subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Under an edict from Coach Eric Mangini, the Jets know they are forbidden from uttering those two tantalizing syllables — play...offs. But Christmas Eve presents them with an afternoon of great temptation.
snippet: Under an edict from Coach Eric Mangini, the Jets know they are forbidden from uttering those two tantalizing syllables — play...offs. But Christmas Eve presents them with an afternoon of great temptation.
